00026 #ifndef SORTINGHEURISTIC_H
00027 #define SORTINGHEURISTIC_H
00028 
00029 using namespace std;
00030 
00031 #include"BiGraph.hxx"
00032 #include"IterativeHeuristic.h"
00033 
00034 class SortingHeuristic: public IterativeHeuristic {
00035 protected:
00037   bool stable_sort;
00040   bool stop_when_no_improvement;
00042   bool order_has_changed;
00044   unsigned long long crossings_before;
00045 
00051   virtual bool sortNodes();
00052 
00053 public:
00055   SortingHeuristic(BiGraph & bigraph, bool stable, bool no_improvement):
00056     IterativeHeuristic(bigraph), stable_sort(stable),
00057     stop_when_no_improvement(no_improvement) { }
00058 
00060   virtual void runHeuristic();
00061 
00064   virtual bool keepGoing() const;
00065 
00068   void makeUnstable() { stable_sort = false; }
00069 
00071   void makeStable() { stable_sort = true; }
00072 
00074   void stopWhenNoImprovement() { stop_when_no_improvement = true; }
00075 
00077   void stopWhenNoChanges() { stop_when_no_improvement = false; }
00078   
00080   virtual ~SortingHeuristic() {}
00081 };
00082 
00083 #endif
